title: Will bitcoin survive in the next 100 years? #bitcoin #crypto #quantumcomputing #ytshorts #fypã‚·
transcript: When it comes to investing in Bitcoin, many wonder how long it will last. There are technical risks [music] like quantum computers that could one day break the cryptography underpinning [music] Bitcoin. So, developers would need to adapt the protocol when the time comes. Bugs are also possible, [music] though the community has patched them before in the early
